website_summaries.verdict: Good value for a holiday dinnerware set that provides service for 8.
pros: Consists of a durable porcelain material, so you can use it for many years
Beautiful artwork that has holiday colors you'll love
Safe to use in both the dishwasher and microwave
cons: Some occasional minor warping and imperfections

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We bought two sets of these and had 13 people for Christmas dinner and many meals before and after with no breakage. That proved these are very durable. Compliments from many of our guests on how pretty they are! Recommend with enthusiasm.
customer_reviews.author: Guzzer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for christmas celebrating. They are an excellent value....arrived quickly and were well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: JAF

customer_reviews.title: Quality and heirloom warranted
customer_reviews.text: The weighted quality.. couldn’t ask for anything better at Nordstrom.. beautiful pieces
customer_reviews.author: nursebethat

customer_reviews.title: Christmas happiness
customer_reviews.text: The Pfaltzgraff Christmas Day dinnerware is amazing. When I opened the package and saw the dishes, it made me so happy. I love them! I look forward to Christmas so I can use them!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dianne F. Swella

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the set! So pretty in person and packaged nicely with nothing damaged. That’s hard to do when shipping dish ware!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived quickly, nothing was broken and the dishes were packaged with care to avoid breakage. The dishes looked fantastic, just like the pictures. The set is durable and a great value overall.
customer_reviews.author: LCR

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: When my order arrived, one bowl was broken. I emailed them and got a response immediately. They sent me another bowl in a timely matter. Totally satisfied. Great value for what you get. I liked that there was no mugs. Totally recommend if you are thinking about this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Beetz

customer_reviews.title: Classic Christmas Design
customer_reviews.text: Just what I’ve been searching for to complete my holiday table. Great quality set for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A set of nice dishes for the price. Looks nice on my Christmas dinner table.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Doerr

customer_reviews.title: Very Christmas-sy
customer_reviews.text: My wife didn't really want new Christmas dishes but she liked these so much she decided to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pattern. Good quality plates
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pattern. Good quality plates. However, some of the paint was scraped off... Looks like in the making of it. Was disappointed as I have heard great things about the brand that's why I went with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas dinner set but the only draw back—no cups and saucers
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Christmas dinner set; I love the pattern, the size of the dinner plates and the other pieces. The reason I gave it a 4 star and not a 5 is because it did not have cups and saucers.
customer_reviews.author: L.D. California

customer_reviews.title: Artistically superior yet durable
customer_reviews.text: I love the Christmas tree design. It has a lush, full appearance making it more appealing to me than others on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This was my first set of Christmas dishes and I love them! Very durable but the design makes them seem delicate. I received 2 broken bowls though with the shipment but not to worry I just simply emailed the company and they sent me two new ones with NO questions or problems. I highly recommend this dinnerware!!
customer_reviews.author: cindy desrosiers

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday dishes
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift, was well received. Perfect condition, very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hoof Arted

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set of dishes. I bought them as a "late" Christmas present. The person who got this gift was overjoyed with the elegance of the plates and the build (durability).. It is a great gift or even an item you personally may want!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Sisson

customer_reviews.title: Love these dishes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these dishes. Great price, excellent dishes, no flaws what so ever, none damaged in shipping. Everything was great and we are enjoying using them for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty Christmas dishes.
customer_reviews.text: The dishes are very pretty. I've only washed them once so far, but they did well in the dishwasher. They are NOT light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas dish set
customer_reviews.text: We had a family holiday meal and used this set, nothing broke and every piece looks perfect. So far they hold up well and look very festive. The glasses set that you can also buy are a great accent.
customer_reviews.author: kymd

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy-Pretty
customer_reviews.text: They were pretty and durable!! Only not a “5” based on some warping in dessert plates— not really noticeable to anyone but me!! Great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Christmas dish set!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to newly married couple. They were very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Suetterlein

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be heavy stonewear but they are beautiful china. My daughter loved them!
customer_reviews.author: MarKeFi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Buy for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely dinnerware set and dishwasher safe. Who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about these beautiful Christmas dishes. They were perfect!!!! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dinnerware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister in law. Very happy with quality and design. We will see about how well it holds up over time. Nice Christmas set though! Good pieces that you actually use:)
customer_reviews.author: S. Goossens

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Dinner for Family
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great price! I was impressed with the quality. Looking forward to hosting my family this year for Christmas dinner!
customer_reviews.author: A K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These were so beautiful. I was more than pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Phillis Ideker

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. She loved it. It makes her holiday table look so festive. It looks really great when placed on red chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Dbake

customer_reviews.title: Cheerful and fun for holiday use.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set of holiday dinnerware for the price. I bought a set of 8. I was looking for a set without cups since they are seldom used and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RKM

customer_reviews.title: Sets a lot very holiday table.
customer_reviews.text: They were just what I was looking for without extraneous pieces. Practically and seasonal. Nice looking for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, money well spent!!!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived safe and sound even though there was a carrier error, I didn’t think I would receive them in time, great communication and received BEFORE they were due to arrive. They are beautiful, quality pieces. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful ! I bought 3 sets 1 bowl was broke I contacted them and recurved the bowl very fast and no Hassle great company to order from
customer_reviews.author: Mona Colglazier

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Holidays.
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Christmas dishes. It put a smile on everyone face when used. So festive!
customer_reviews.author: maria sodek

customer_reviews.title: Great merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Love the dinnerware used it for Christmas dinner everybody loved it
customer_reviews.author: Mike Salazar majic

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking. Will likely scratch with first use. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn Styers

customer_reviews.title: Christmas dishes
customer_reviews.text: They are more beautiful than I anticipated! They are a gift but may have to gift a set to myself!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Thurn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Great value and beautiful dishes. Came packaged securely so none would be damaged in transit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the dinnerware just beautiful - can’t wait for Christmas dinner
customer_reviews.author: melissa j noirot

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, however, a couple of my plates had imperfections on them.
customer_reviews.author: kbarr

customer_reviews.title: The dishes were beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: The set of dishes captured the holiday spirit and were a nice addition to my Christmas table.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Scott

customer_reviews.title: Christmas dinner ware
customer_reviews.text: My wife was very happy with these. They were also a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: that they are exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift but I do wish you had matching glass ware
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Festive dishes
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern, so much fun to have quality Christmas dishes at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful holiday table set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set arrived w four broken bowls and replacement was sent within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Lin starr

customer_reviews.title: Pfaltzgraff Christmas Day 24 Piece Dinnerware
customer_reviews.text: The dishes are beautiful. They arrived with no chips or cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great Plates!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these plates and they are perfect for Christmas. highly Reccomend to anyone looking for a good plates that festive and decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Gail W.

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, perfect! Exactly as pictured , shipped and packed safely, beautiful design and solid weight dishware.
customer_reviews.author: Kenmareroots

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for Christmas plates and I'm so happy I came across this set. They are cute, durable and an excellent value. They were packaged well, so all of the dishes were in tact. They also arrived on time and look great! I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: RMack

customer_reviews.title: Christmas is here!
customer_reviews.text: These Christmas plates are just what the holiday called for. After looking at all different brands of plates I decided on these. The price was one of the best. The Pfaltzgraff name was a factor as I have other dishes made by them. There were enough place settings for my family. I received many positive comments on the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Sy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I was obsessed with finding dinnerware for our Christmas Eve dinner but did not want to spend a few hundred dollars. I absolutely love these plates! They were perfect and I can’t to use them every year on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect holiday dishes!
customer_reviews.text: I’m thrilled with my purchase of two sets. The packaging was perfect—not a cracked dish in the lot! Great quality —vibrant colors just as pictured. I spent hours looking for holiday plates with good quality at a reasonable price—got everything I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Florida

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HOLIDAY DISHES
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for holiday dishes that weren’t too expensive and offered only the plate, salad plate, and bowl. I love the design on the dishes, it is simple and not too gawky! Love these dishes and know I will use them for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this product yet as I brought it after Christmas My plan is to use it this year at Christmas I love the design Even prettier then pictured Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Judy K. Foy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Christmas holidays
customer_reviews.text: The design is great. I only did 4 stars because one of the plates was a bit warped, but perfectly usable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Crane, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for the holidays
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after Christmas and New Years. They look really nice. Can't wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: JoeJoe56

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: A lovely set of Christmas dishes and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Christmas dishes.
customer_reviews.text: They are so pretty and Christmasy. I can't wait to use them next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: DottieHon

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: These dishes were even prettier in person than in the picture. I’ve gotten several compliments
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Great value-beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: The dishes are beautiful!!! Great value for a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: susan hall

customer_reviews.title: Festive Dinner
customer_reviews.text: Love mine with red chargers and green cloth napkins! Looking forward to Christmas Day dinner♥️
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Yaryan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love these dishes. I ordered to late to use them for Christmas but I am excited to use them next Christmas. They are even prettier than they look in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Holiday Pattern
customer_reviews.text: My family and I are very pleased with the set of dinnerware we purchased. The holiday pattern is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: W/LU

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love my new dishes! Perfect for a special holiday with my family!!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Spezzano

product_meta.title: Pfaltzgraff Christmas Day Dinnerware Set, Service For 8, White
product_meta.description: Celebrate the holidays with this festive dinnerware! 24 piece dinnerware set, service for eight, includes (8) each: 10-1/2 inch dinner plate, 8 inch salad plate and 6 inch diameter (25 ounce) soup cereal bowl. Crafted of porcelain. Microwave and dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Bring the warm feeling of gathering around the tree to the dinner table with the Christmas Day collection
24 piece dinnerware set, service for eight, includes (8) each: 10-1/2 inch dinner plate, 8 inch salad plate and 6 inch diameter (25 ounce) soup cereal bowl
Crafted of porcelain, making the dinnerware durable for years to come

Crated of porcelain. 24 piece dinnerware set, service for eight, includes (8) each: 10-1/2 inch dinner plate, 8 inch salad plate and 6 inch diameter (25 ounce) soup cereal bowl. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
